articles.title: 5 Seeds Which Help Control Blood Sugar Levels - WION
articles.description: 5 Seeds Which Help Control Blood Sugar Levels
articles.content: Chia seeds are filled with fibre, anti-oxidants and Omega-3 fatty acids. They slow down the absorption of sugar and the process of digestion, which helps in stabilising blood sugar levels.
